title: What is a mixture? What are some examples, and why are they mixtures? - Quora

response.answer_text: Mixture is an impure substance made up of two or more substances which are miscible or immiscible in each other. Mixture can be either homogeneous or heterogeneous. Homogeneous mixtures:Salt water - salt + water Alloys (Eg: Brass - copper + zinc) Air ( mixture of various gases like nitrogen, oxygen, carbon dioxide, argon etc) Note: All gaseous mixtures are homogeneous 2. Heterogeneous mixtures: Milk - water + lactose + etc Cold cream - oil + water Mineral water - minerals + water
